about_the_game:
A thrilling, Carmageddon-inspired roguelite game blending high-octane driving and action with strategic elements.

Dive into an adrenaline-pumping, Carmageddon-inspired roguelite experience that seamlessly fuses high-octane driving and explosive action with strategic gameplay. In this game, you'll take the wheel of a variety of customizable cars, each with unique capabilities. Outfit your vehicles with an arsenal of weapons, spikes, and other deadly modifications to dominate your foes.

Face off against fierce opponents in a series of breathtaking levels, including a gritty factory, a chaotic zoo, a bustling town, and many more. Your primary mission is to finish a variety of strategic goals while protecting your own car from relentless attacks.

To achieve this, you'll need to crash enemy vehicles, send them into hydraulic presses, and amass credits for your destructive prowess. Each level demands tactical thinking and strategic maneuvers, making every playthrough a unique challenge.

With stunning graphics powered by the Unreal 5 engine, this game offers a visually captivating experience that will leave you on the edge of your seat. Whether you're a fan of chaotic car battles or strategic gameplay, this game provides the ultimate blend of both worlds.

Buckle up, customize your ride, and prepare for the ride of a lifetime.

Key Features:

  • Customizable Vehicles: Start with one versatile car and equip it with a range of modifications, including weapons, spikes, and other deadly enhancements. As you advance, unlock multiple vehicles to modify and customize according to your strategy.

  • Multiple Maps: Conquer and play through a variety of levels such as Town, Zoo, Factory, and more. Each map presents unique challenges and strategic opportunities that test your skills.

  • Strategic Gameplay: While protecting your own car, you'll need to complete various strategic mission goals.

  • Rogue lite Mechanics: Adapt your strategy and vehicle modifications to overcome obstacles and foes. Each playthrough offers a fresh challenge with changing variables.

  • Stunning Graphics: Powered by the Unreal 5 engine, the game showcases breathtaking visuals, bringing the chaotic world and intense car battles to life.

Discover the perfect blend of driving, action, and strategy in this exciting game.
